name: Assault on Crown Archipelago
description:
+ Plot +

Help a pirate regain his coins and missing parts of his ship from hordes of armed monkeys.  Hop from one island to another, solving puzzles and fighting swarms of monkeys--sometimes while drunk.

+ Controls +
  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Ctrl/Mouse 1 to use currently selected weapon
  • E to interact with buttons and large items
  • Shift to run
  • M to glance at your map when on shore
+ Using the Map +

Aboard your ship, you will find a table upon which rests your map of the archipelago.  Press E while looking at your map to open it.  Red islands are islands which have not yet been unlocked, while green islands are islands that are currently unlocked and can be sailed to.  Red islands can be unlocked once you have collected a certain amount of coins (shown when hovering over the island).  Once an island has been visited, your map will reveal how many of its coins and chests have been collected.  See if you can collect them all!

+ Pickups +

- Coin:  Pick these up to unlock islands and restore your health!

- Chest: Collect 15 of these pirate treasures to leave the archipelago.

  - Grog: Restores 1/4 of your health, but makes you drunk!

Your weapons have been stolen by the monkeys. They're also important parts of your ship, and you must get them back!

+ Enemies +

Your only enemy is the monkey, the pirate's original foe.  Some wield blades, others wield spears, and some are even known to be shamans, wielding great powers.  Monkeys are known to strike when you least expect it.  It is best to be sober when facing them.
